UI/UX Design & Front-End Development

HTML - CSS - JavaScript - Responsive Design

SAMPSA SAARI

UI/UX Designer & Front-End Developer | Oulu, Finland

I am Front-End Developer with good eye on design. I enjoy creating simple, beatiful and intuitive user interfaces. I love to bring my designs to life in HTML, CSS & JavaScript.

I have created my first Website at age of 10, when I got my first computer. Since then I have created multiple sites using HTML & CSS. Now I'm learning to master JavaScript also.

I have graduated from Oulu University of Applied Sciences, with Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) degree. Now I'm working with my Master's Degree in Oulu University, and looking for new job opportunities. Visit my LinkedIn page to learn more about my experience and skills, or contact me by e-mail.

When I'm not working with Design & Development, I'm spending time with my family, lifting weights at gym or taking photographs of our beautiful nature. You can view my photographs from Flickr or 500px.
